data.name: Of Hunting and Dancing
data.description: An encampment set up with some skill that has referenced the famed writings of the researcher Musk to recreate a hilichurl dwelling, and which can be used to study their living habits.\nThey say that in the past, the Knights of Favonius would set up such camps and engage in detailed planning, led by the Outriders, ahead of expeditions against monsters. The seafaring Crux Fleet also tends to set sand tables up in a similar fashion based on various sources of intelligence to simulate boarding an island and clearing it of monsters.

text.text: You built such a spacious campsite — amazing...
Can I practice my archery and scouting techniques here?
Or maybe we can practice together! Let's compete and see who wins!
It's a bit rough around the edges, but we have weapons, space, and everything else we might need.
So, limber up and let's go a few rounds. Don't worry about holding back!
This place ain't half bad. I like it!
This place sure looks familiar. I might have blown up— Um, I mean, seen a house like this one before!
Anyway, this place is huuuuge! We're gonna have lots of fun, I know it!
#{F#Miss}{M#Mr.} Honorary Knight, you can play with me, too!
This camp is flawless in every way. It's just a shame that there are no bones lying around...
With a little renovation, perhaps this place could be used for even more valuable research...
Are you interested? Can you... help me?
This camp is interesting. The lodgings and the furniture are crude, but if you look closely, the layout does seem to have an order to it.
It's tribal. Feels a bit familiar... but different, too.
Maybe if I stick around long enough, I can learn something from this land.
